info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued October 3 at 5:29PM PDT until October 3 at 6:30PM PDT by NWS Las Vegas NV
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... South central Inyo County in south central California...
* Until 630 PM PDT.
* At 529 PM PDT, a dust channel was 19 miles southwest of Furnace Creek, moving south at 15 mph.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph.
SOURCE...National Park Service
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel along Badwater Road and Trona-Wildrose Road.
This dust channel will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Inyo County.
info.instruction:
Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 6:30 PM PDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 6:30 PM PDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 6:30 PM PDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 6:30 PM PDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
